Title: Highwind's WINNING Solo Mid Beasts of War

ItemTooltips.gauntlets: Get HP to win your lane.
ItemTooltips.belt_of_strength: This builds into necro and adds some tankage.
ItemTooltips.staff_of_wizardry: ALSO builds into necro. adds some much needed mana
ItemTooltips.boots: Boots after bottle play it right bro.
ItemTooltips.flask: For Mid you need these. STAY IN THE LANE WITH THE REGEN
ItemTooltips.bottle: Get as soon as posssible. with the hawk you will have some sick rune control. boar can slow the enemy on the way
ItemTooltips.tango: GET ONE SURVIVE EARLY!!!!!!!!!!!!!! Use when lightly harassed
ItemTooltips.courier: ONLY GET IF A SUPPORT DIDNT. IF THEY DID THEN SAVE FOR THAT EARLY SICK BOTTLE
ItemTooltips.travel_boots: Can tp to your hawk and backdoor towers. good pick up.
ItemTooltips.necronomicon: NECROBOOKKKKKK for the push builds. domiante the midgame and end early.

AbilityTooltips.beastmaster_wild_axes: I dont feel they scale well enough to justify them being leveled until later. They can be used for last hitting and harass early.
AbilityTooltips.beastmaster_call_of_the_wild: Your hawk is rune control. your boar is last hit and perma slow for ganks. never lose a lane with this little guy.
AbilityTooltips.beastmaster_inner_beast: your necro and ur beastsattack fast as ever KILL EVERYTHANG
AbilityTooltips.beastmaster_primal_roar: This ultimate goes through magic immunities. it's great for ganking. use it as often as possible.
